page.title: 09DANCING IN CHELTENHAM
page.content: Dancing is very popular nowadays and there are lots of styles to choose from, such as :_ ballet, which is a graceful dance and has many different types.For example: The Scottish Ballet,The Royal Ballet ,I.S.T.D,R.A.D and lots more._tap, you wear special shoes with metal on the toe and heel which makes a tapping sound when you move your feet about.'Modern' is a stylish dance with lots of steps and movements.Country dancing is also another kind of dance,which has got a lot of skipping and a lot of energetic movements and you dance to lively music. You wear trainers on your feet. There are lots of other different lively dances with different names such as the May_pole and so on.We both enjoy dancing very much and Andrea goes to all the types of dancing mentioned on this page.
